game.l_dis:
Play Grand Theft Auto Advance Online – Liberty City Prequel

Grand Theft Auto Advance brings the iconic crime-filled world of Liberty City to the Game Boy Advance. Set a year before the events of GTA III, players step into the shoes of Mike, a small-time criminal framed for his partner's murder, as he seeks revenge and climbs the ranks of the underworld.

What is Grand Theft Auto Advance?

GTA Advance is a top-down action-adventure game combining elements of the original 2D GTA titles with early features from the 3D era. Explore a condensed version of Liberty City, interact with familiar characters, and complete missions involving theft, combat, and criminal schemes.

How to Play Grand Theft Auto Advance

  • Explore Liberty City: Navigate streets, alleys, and buildings from a top-down perspective.
  • Complete Missions: Carry out assignments including theft, assassination, and delivery tasks.
  • Collect Weapons: Use a variety of guns, explosives, and melee tools to survive.
  • Avoid Law Enforcement: Escape the police or risk being arrested during missions.
  • Interact with Characters: Meet allies and enemies from the GTA universe as you progress through the story.

Why Play Grand Theft Auto Advance Online?

Play Grand Theft Auto Advance unblocked and free in your browser. Experience a portable prequel to GTA III, complete with top-down action, an engaging story, and familiar Liberty City locations, all without the need for downloads or emulators.

Key Features

  • Top-Down Action: Classic GTA-style gameplay adapted for handheld devices.
  • Liberty City Prequel: Explore a version of the city a year before GTA III.
  • Story-Driven Missions: Follow Mike’s journey for revenge and survival.
  • Variety of Weapons: Utilize guns, explosives, and melee attacks.
  • Unblocked Access: Play online instantly on any device.

Survive the Streets of Liberty City!

Step into the criminal underworld as Mike in Grand Theft Auto Advance. Complete missions, escape law enforcement, and interact with iconic characters in a compact, portable Liberty City. Play unblocked online and experience the GTA prequel today!
